dmca.title: Poet complains of copying
dmca.body:
Notice of Copyright reference 

http://xiingyii-ai-ni.blogspot.com/

[private]
[private] 
Newcastle upon Tyne
[private]
England
[private]

Sir, Madam,

I am the author and copyright holder of the below
material, one poem illegally displayed as located on
your Internet servers, this material has been on my
web site since 1986 ongoing and has been taken and
reproduced by a user or users with you.

I write for three registered UK charities and they
provide me with free copyright on all my works, all
poems are sold in booklet form to raise income for
charity.

I swear on oath and as a committed Christian too
(under penalty of Federal and European prosecution for
perjury that I do own the copyright to the material
designated below.

If you require a signed copy let em know, I can post
one today or send one as an image attachment or post a
copy on my servers for you to view and print.

[private]

Please Note

1.) the material has been taken, used without my given

consent or authorisation (data theft)
2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have
clearly been ignored infringed and breached
3.) the data thief has falsified the author
information on your site (plagiarism)
4.) my written work has been left with out any
copyright warnings and is open to abuse on your server
5.) Your own TOS (terms of service have been
breached)
6.)As long as this work is displayed on servers
without given author consent your company, any hosting
servers are liable for 
payment of commission and royalties 
soliciting traffic by illegal use of my work to
potentially gain interest to your service without
given consent

If you look through Yahoo MSN or Google search you
will see this is taken from my own web via the given
URL?s and all IP addresses pages viewed are also
logged as recorded by the site meter in use and your
customers own ISP servers too. 

Not only are all my poems copyright but are also
published. Please remove this poem as a matter of
urgency. 

I do not consent to my poems being displayed by any
web site unless I personally place them there, this
ensures my work and web site is always ever unique in
it?s own right. Writing for UK registered charities 
we have already sued six bogus poets for plagiarism
and data theft of two particular poems. I hope to hear
from you on this as a matter of urgency. 

Poem displayed on your site clearly marked as on my
own web site at location(s) given below.

http://www.quickegreets.com/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/wife/wife1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/wife/wife1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/wife/wife1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/wife/wife1.htm

CRS
